EmailTemplate.description: Email when status of item does not change within certain timeframe
EmailTemplate.name: Project Feedback Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Provide Resolution Comments and Update Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Project_Feedback__c.Topic__c} Scrum Team,
This email is to remind you to log a status update for project feedback no.: {!Project_Feedback__c.Name}.
Please update the project feedback and provide your resolution comments on the following topic: {!Project_Feedback__c.Topic__c}.
You can directly access the project feedback record in the toolkit at the following link:
{!Project_Feedback__c.Link}
Thanks
